entry.def: Vegetables and fruit that are mushy are soft and have lost most of their shape.

example.ex: When the fruit is mushy and cooked, remove from the heat.
example.tran: 当水果变软煮好后，就从火上端下来。

entry.tran: 感伤的;多愁善感的;多情的
entry.def: If you describe someone or something as mushy, you mean that they are very sentimental.

example.ex: Don't go getting all mushy and sentimental.
example.tran: 不要变得过于多愁善感。

auth_sentence.content: Spoon the sweet potato wedges and mushy peas alongside.

sentences.en: We went to the chip shop and had the works: fish, chips, gherkins and mushy peas.
sentences.cn: 我们到薯条店去吃了套餐：鱼、薯条、酸黃瓜还有豆泥。

sentences.en: Cook the lentils until they are mushy.
sentences.cn: 把扁豆烧到呈烂糊状为止。

sentences.en: I hate those mushy love stories.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌那些伤感的爱情故事。
